author: sky.cactus
content: If 1559 goes in first then Escalator would need to be reworded a bit, but it is a minor change.

author: sky.cactus
content: Right now a transaction has a `gasPrice`.  With 1559 it would have `gasPremium, maxFee`.  Escalator pre-1559 would make `gasPrice` be a function of time.  Escalator post-1559 would make `gasPremium` and `maxFee` be a function of time.
